titles: The royal pharmacopœea, galenical and chymical according to the practice of the most eminent and learned physitians of France : and publish'd with their several approbations / by Moses Charras, th Kings chief operator in his royal garden of plants ; faithfully Englished ; illustrated with several copper plates.
Pharmacopée royale galénque et chimique. English
author: Charas, Moyse, 1619-1698.
publisher: Printed for John Starkey ..., and Moses Pitt ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
